title: Module 1: Javascript
body: In Module 1 we revised and solidified key Javascript concepts and did various labs in Javascript, HTML and CSS
author: Trix Mostert

title: Module 2: REACT, Node, APIs
body: In Module 2 we dived deep into the world of REACT with REST and did various labs for e-Commerce, SPAs and group projects
author: Trix Mostert

title: In Module 3 we added the backend: express and MongoDB
body: Express is a technology that allows you to build your own server. MongoDb is an open source DB
author: Trix Mostert

title: Finding a job in IT in the EU in 2025
body: After the world emerged from COVID, we have to face various challenges in the European job market
author: Trix Mostert
